name: Ludum Dare 33 - Bonefish the game
description:
First Ludum Dare Game!

Boy this s a diszaser. Going in trying to build a engine AND a game was a horrible idea in 72 hours !

JAM Link: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=p...

Please leave a comment on the jam page too if your in LD33! :)

Game ends when you crash with a memory leak.

However tons of lessons were learned. Hope you enjoy it.

Engine & Game Coded in C++.

Controls:
WSAD - Move
Space - Flamebreath

NOTE: YOU NEED VS2015 C++ Redistribute TO PLAY.
https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.a...

Sorry Unix users... no ports for you, just too much work at the moment.

Authors:
Stephen Ma (Twitter: @tehPHEN)
Mitchell Craig (Twitter: @mitchcraig311)
